name: fastsearch-mcp
description: Lightning-fast file search for Claude Desktop using NTFS Master File Table with privilege separation architecture.
author: Sandra & Claudius

prompts.name: search_files_prompt
prompts.description: Search for files using the FastSearch engine
prompts.template: Search for files containing '{query}' in {path}. {case_sensitive?Case-sensitive search:Case-insensitive search}. {max_results?Return up to {max_results} results.}

prompts.name: search_by_extension_prompt
prompts.description: Search for files with specific extensions
prompts.template: Find {extensions} files containing '{query}' in {path}. {max_results?Show up to {max_results} results.}

prompts.name: search_recent_files_prompt
prompts.template: Find recently {modified:modified|created|accessed} files in {path} {query?containing '{query}'}. {max_results?Show up to {max_results} results.}

prompts.name: get_search_stats_prompt
prompts.description: Get statistics about the search index

prompts.name: check_service_status_prompt
prompts.description: Check the status of the FastSearch service
prompts.template: Check if the FastSearch service is running

prompts.name: find_duplicate_files_prompt
prompts.description: Find duplicate files in a directory
prompts.template: Find duplicate files in {path} {max_size?larger than {max_size} bytes} {min_size?smaller than {min_size} bytes}

prompts.name: find_large_files_prompt
prompts.description: Find large files in a directory

prompts.name: search_by_date_range_prompt
prompts.description: Search for files modified within a date range

examples.name: Search for configuration files
examples.prompt: Find all .config and .json files in the project directory

examples.name: Find large log files
examples.prompt: Find log files larger than 100MB in the logs directory

examples.name: Search for recently modified Python files
examples.prompt: Find Python files modified in the last 7 days

common_issues.solution: Run the FastSearch service with administrator privileges
Ensure the service has proper permissions to access the search paths
Check if the index is up to date and the search paths are correctly configured
